relevant_findings.CT_scan_neck: hypodense mass in the right neck
relevant_findings.oral_pantography: circumscribed radiolucency in the body of the mandible
relevant_findings.surgical_exploration: parathyroid carcinoma of the right upper parathyroid gland

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Postoperatively, serum calcium and parathyroid hormone levels reverted to the normal range 3 months after the operation.
